unnormalised: ## Prakritik Horok: Apenak Marang Laka Te, Bhaiya!
normalised: ## Jibic Chas: Amang Uli Roka-a, Bhai!

unnormalised: He Har Horo Pera Ko! Chaloka Prakritik Horok lagit kathaoka, je katha Punjab khon Tamil Nadu Mandi re jati-jati katha chalak kan. Uruj pe, apeak marang baba ko oka lekate horok ko horok keda? Nahen bes rasayanik dabo, nawa purana katha dharam katha, ar Prakriti (Nature) lagit gahar budhi menata. Ene katha lah kate horok kathaoka.
normalised: Hey chas-hor-bhai-ko! Aalo-pe-katha-tabon-a-pe Jibic Chas-a-bachha-ko, en-chase-do-Punjab-khon-Tamil-Nadu-ge-sanam-bajar-re-do-e-chalao-kan-a. Pe-chetan-keda-a daadi-hapan-ko-chase-dinj-do-pe? Nutun-rasayanik-jinish-do-banuk', mulu'-din-a-kasta-kam-ar-Prakriti- (Dinj-)re-bes-gyan-te-ge. Enka-leka-ge-doh-am-aale-do-katha-tabon-a-pe.

unnormalised: Prakritik Horok duka, horok ko ar dangra dupka dabo bana hodor khad, peste, ar badlaw sarjom jeev (GMOs) bada horok. Ene horok duka, oka lekate jugin horok ko horok hata, ene lekate – tikau ar disom logte milaw horok. Hasak re rasayanik dabo horok badle, menak prakritik dhang lekate horok ko horok, horok pheraw, khad bana (gobor gas planta uruj pe?), ar jeev peste horok (nim tel lekate – ene katha jadu menak!).
normalised: Jibic chas-do-do-hasar-are-hasar-banaoe-ak-a-tege, ar-baba-ko-hor-ko-dal-utau-ak-a-rasayanik-urbarak, kira-nasak-dawai-ar-jati-badlao-akan-jiban- (G M Os-)ge-banuk'. Pe-bhabana-tabon-a-pe en-chas-do-sanam-din-ge-enku-leka-ge-do-a, tikau-dohok-keda-ar-dinj-sathe-milau-akan. Hasar-re-rasayanik-dawai-ko-emao-badla-re, aale-do-prakritik-upay-ko-re-nirbhar-ak-a, jemon-fasol-ghuri-badlao, gobar-khad-banao- (pe-chetan-keda-a-gobar-gas-dohot-do?), ar-jibic-kira-nasak-ko- (jemon-nim-tel-do-jaadu-leka-kan-a!) ko-use-ak-a.

unnormalised: Henda, aape lekate urug har horok ko lagit duka, katek Prakritik Horok lagit budhi korok katha? Jugin, ene duka, menak ar menak pera ko lagit bes satha menak. Apeak baingan bharta re peste baha renah chhada lagit chinta dabo! Prakritik horok duka, bes poshak tattwa (nutrients) bahti menak. Ar, hasak lagit bes menak! Prakritik horok renah dhang duka hasak renah satha do bes korok, jaman urug ar dak dhura sahti do barhaw. Uruj pe, raba dak re kam nirbhor ar urun saal reho bes horok!

Baari, atang ko menak. Prakritik horok bonga re badlaw duka, muskil menak. Pailwan saal ko re horok duka kam hobok do, ar nawa dhang ko chekhet lagit chahida. Baari, din dhabra phayda ko duka bes menak. Prakritik horok lagit haat duka har har menak, khaskar Mumbai ar Delhi lekate sahri ko re. Apeak prakritik basmati chawl ar desi tamatar lagit bes daam ape do jom do.

Bharat Krishi Gaveshna Parishad (ICAR) ar Tamil Nadu Krishi Vishwavidyalaya lekate sanstha ko duka, Prakritik Horok ko barhaw ar har horok ko lagit chekhet (training) do jom. Sarkar duka, Prakritik Horok lagit sahayta rasi ar yojana ko do jom do.

Ene katha budhi korok pe – apeak chutku sorg (heaven) renah jage do horok do, 2000 sq ft ghati bahar baghcha lekate, prakritik dhang ko logte ape do horok do. Apeak sardi-sag, jahar-pati, ar jom-phal ko do horok. Uruj pe, apeak pera ko bes ar poshak tattwa bahti jom do jom, ene lekate sukh do jom.

Uruj pe, ene katha duka horok katha dabo; ene katha duka menak hasak do jato ko (future generations) lagit bachaw. Ene katha duka Dharti Maa ko samman korok ar Nature logte kam korok, ene katha do ba. Ene lagit, apeak pera har horok ko logte katha korok pe, prakritik dhang ko lagit gaveshna korok pe, ar mone hobo ak workshop re do jom. Thaniya Krishi Vigyan Kendra renah Dr. Sharma ape do bes lekate sikhaw do.
normalised: Pe-chetan-keda-a, en-do-adi-chas-do-banuk'; en-do-aape-a'-hasar-ko-aagami-pidhi-ko-lagit-dohok-keda. En-do-Dharti-Maa-ko-manao-ar-dinj-sathe-kam-do-akan-a, adi-dinj-ko-kam-do-adi-do-banuk'. Hoh-am, am-a'-chas-hor-bhai-ko-sathe-katha-tabon-a-pe, jibic-chas-upay-ko-khoj-tabon-a-pe, ar-doh-am-workshop-re-bhelau-tabon-a-pe. Krishi-Vigyan-Kendra-re-Doctor-Sharma-do-nischit-ge-uku-bichhu-ko-uduh-a-pe.

unnormalised: Chutku khon jugin, ar jamin do sikha do, ar ape do prakritik horok duka, apeak bes nirnay menak. Ape do NABARD yojana khon Rs. 50,000 sahayta rasi do jom do! Jai Kisan!
